newsitem.title: GERMANY: VW shares advance on H1 profit, sales.
newsitem.headline: VW shares advance on H1 profit, sales.

text.p: Shares in Volkswagen AG were higher in an otherwise sharply weaker market, gaining after the German carmaker reported a 73 percent rise in first-half group net profit and higher global vehicle deliveries.
VW shares were up 29 marks at 1,282 marks in IBIS computer dealings, up from about 1,263 marks before the results were released.
The IBIS DAX, which reflects all-day computer dealings, was down 12.96 points at 4,064.63 points and the bourse DAX was down 85.99 points at 4,066.87.
VW's group net profit figure was slightly below various analyst estimates for about 500 million marks.
